column4: I have a laptop which is giving me trouble.  It is Windows Vista, so the C:\ and D:\ are both NTFS.  Long story short, the Recovery Partition (D:\) is corrupt.  Is there a free utility that might reciver an NTFS partition?
If I can get it to read again, all I'd have to do is Ghost it to another drive.  I think the HD is toast, but it is so much so, now ><
if it is really valuable data I would consider giving the hd to specialists
